1.0.name: wordpress/wp-restrict-user-add-new-page-capability
1.0.description: This plugin will disable all non-admin users (with capabilities), from creating and adding new pages in your blog. Works very well with the 'WP Restrict User 'ADD NEW POST' Capability' plugin (to prevent non-admins from creating and adding new POSTS), to your blog. The "add new page" submenu will also be hidden from the non-admin user.
